title: Question
body: So one of my friends that I am kind of close to (we duo and talk in discord etc.) has been banned for third party application. I'm scared that I'll get punished   because I simply duo'd with him in the past. Does anyone know if I would get banned?

replies.body: Bans are not contagious by association, they are given on a case by case basis. Unless you offend the rules yourself in some manner (in this case, using 3rd party software), otherwise you can't get a punishment just because someone you know has gotten it.
Unless you have used them yourself, no.
